Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Complete the following: 
QMB3310 - Spreadsheets in Business Analytics (3)

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Solving quantitative problems using the Python programming language.  It is designed for students pursuing a career in business analytics.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Computer-based quantitative decision models (including linear programming and extensions, queuing, network models, simulation) and decision support systems for business organizations.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Wide range of uses of spreadsheets for solving quantitative problems.  It is designed for students pursuing a career in business analytics.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to mathematical and statistical analysis of economics and business problems.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: QMB 3003 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The use of statistical methods as scientific tools in the analysis of economics and business problems.

QMB4911 - Capstone Project in Business A.name: QMB4911 - Capstone Project in Business Analytics

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Learners will bring together all of the tools learned in the program to solve a business analytics problem.

QMB3602 - Business Research for Decision.name: QMB3602 - Business Research for Decision Making

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introductory course in business research focused on the planning, collection, organization, and assimilation of quantitative information to make and present data driven business decisions.
